key.name: selected-source
key.description: The identifier of the selected image source to obtain the picture of the day from.

key.name: current-metadata
key.description: The metadata for the current image, in JSON, automatically stored by this extension.

key.name: last-scheduled-refresh
key.description: The ISO 8601-formatted timestamp of the last refresh of the image.

key.name: api-key
key.description:
The API key to use for requests to the APOD API.
The default key is usually fine, but if you find that you are rate-limited, you may wish to use your own API key, which you can obtain free of charge at https://api.nasa.gov/.
